name: Type of Bees
description: In this chapter we will look at all the different bees this mod has to offer. In general there are 5 different types of bees: $(li)$(l:bees_hive)Hive Bees$() $(li)$(l:bees_modded)Mod Bees$() $(li)$(l:bees_worker)Professional$() $(li)$(l:bees_solitary)Solitary Bees$() $(li)$(l:bees_wild)Wild Bees$()$(br2)They all have unique traits and mechanics which we will discuss in the following entries
